content.detailedDescription: On 7/13/11 i saw a ufo, on 7/15/11 i wrote two pages of notes, it was on wednesday at 12:10-12:15 am, i was driving east on i-10, i drive this route 5 nights a week hauling freight from ft. stockton, tx - san antonio, tx.  at about the 340 mile marker i noticed a bright light in the sky, like a large airplane (747) with landing light on, they were shining directly towards me.  in this part of the country there are no large airports, san antonio is 200 miles to the east.  i continued watching the lights thinking that they should be approaching faster than they were if it was a large airplane, the lights seemed to be at an estimate of 2000' above the ground.  i continued traveling at 65 mph coming up a 4-5% grade with hills and highway cut outs occasionally blocking my view from the lights.  as i watched, i thought that the object turned because the headlights faded away.  as i came to the top of the grade i could still see the object and it was closer to me and seemed to be moving 80-100 mph, maybe slower, for the size of it i knew that it was moving but it seemed to be head  hovering.  i just mentioned that i thought it turned but i'm pretty darn sure that they turned the lights off and they went off like stadium lights do, slowly, that's why i thought that it turned, i was still about 3/4 - 1 mile away when this happened.  the skies were clear and the moon was about 7/8 full.  after topping the grade i lost sight momentarily because of the hills and cut outs.  as i follow the highway it curved to the right and started down a 4-5% grade (mm345) and i could really see what it was, a triangle 250-500' to each corner, 1500-2000' above me on my left at a 40 degree angle and about 1/4-1/2 mile away. it had a fairly large light in each corner and a smaller light in the center where there seemed to be a dome on the bottom center.  all the lights were white and steady, no pulsing, and there was no beam being case.  the corner lights were large enough and bright enough that they should have been casting a beam but they didn't.  i couldn't see any of the body of the object other than the possible dome on the bottom.  i'm sure some people will suggest that these lights may be individual objects and i will strongly suggest that all the lights belonged to one object.  i didn't see any windows, hear any noise (remember i'm in a large truck), or see any exhaust.  i had a good visual of this object for about 10 seconds as i curved down the grade.  there were 7 or 8 other vehicles traveling east and west in my vicinity ani d i didn't see anyone stop.  as i continued to drive i thought, "i've seen one now".  i don't know if it was military or alien, but i lean towards anti-gravity alien.  i didn't have any fear or shock and i don't think that they were concerned about being seen.
content.summary: 250'-500' triangle, large round lights on each corner, dome bottom center with small light, forward lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw what i thought was a falling star on august 26, 2011 while celebrating my husband's birthday near peggy heller school.  it glowed white/yellow and then stopped and hovered.  after about three seconds it took off into another direction very rapidly toward santa fe/merced. only one of my other friends saw it too.  it was a yellow sphere which turned blue when it changed direction.  i work at castle airport and know that did not come from our airport.

i just googled ufo sighting in atwater, ca today after i saw the same thing last night over santa fe going into merced.  this time it looked bigger and a lot closer and changed from yellow, to red, to orange, to blue and hovered over the road.  even after these sightings, i still don't believe in aliens.  however you have to admit i saw some strange stuff.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo - round glowing object in atwater, ca - august 26, 2011 & november 16, 2011

content.detailedDescription: On september 14 2011 at 2000hrs at the walmart store located at hwy 70 in the city of clayton nc, as i came out of the store, i observed a three sets of three red triangular shapes lights hovering on the area above the visual direction of wendell nc ( this is  based on the position in where i was located).  they were not for sure airplanes, because at the time this happened an airplane was crossing thru and a lady was coming out of the store at the same time, i point to her to look at the lights and she said, "it is an airplane" to which i answered to her "no it is not, because that one is an airplane" (me pointing to the airplane on the other direction for her to see the difference among both objects) so she noticed but pay not attention.  all of the triangular units were not connected (i could see thru the dark ski, like if they were with some kind of clogging devise as on star trek movies) but each of the three sets of lights even though they do not appear to be connected with each othe, they were moving as an entity each set of three red lights, but each set was individual to each other set.  one set took off in an incredible speed toward the ski. then after a few seconds the second set did the same, but the third set was just hovering and suddenly vanished on place.  i reported the incident to the local police (they do not pay attention to the information.) and also to the local news paper. nothing had been done since.  i must indicate that i never smoke or drink or use any kind of drug of any kind in my entire life.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Three sets of three triangular red lights hovering/travelling/vanishing/and taking off at incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother david were in the truck driving to the deer woods.When the sky just got so bright it was like complete daylight but at 4:30 in the morning so bright you could count the rocks on the gravel road.It lite up the sky unbelievabley i looked and him and we both looked out it was a huge circle going over head maybe 100 ft from the ground.I asked him wth was that omg david what is that we both kinda just went woooahh. well it didnt get weird till we got to were my other brother and a guy named orybry where at and the first thing i said was omg did you guys see that ufo.Both of them said did you guys see that also they also added that it flew straight over the top of them and landed in the woods this is 4 people who seen the exact same thing and were in different cars and more then 10-11 miles away from each other. one of the most amazing things ive seen in my life im sstill scared when i go to those woods alone still gives me chills even talking about it.
content.summary: It lite up the sky so bright then took off to the woods

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and was planning to smoke a cigarette on my terrace when i noticed a big red glowing thing in the sky right on top of the house of my neighbor. i thought it was a plane but it was round and glowing and had no sound,then thought it's a flare until i noticed that it had small white lights on top of it and it was flying steady across the sky to my house's direction.I had to go back inside to get my phone to call my sister who lives right beside me to see it too,but i called out her name instead of taking my eyes of it by dialing her number.She came out and saw it too. it flew straight,and i lost sight of it when it went past my house,the roof of my house covered my sight where it headed to.
content.summary: It was glowing red and it had small white lights on top of it

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on hwy 22 approximately 1 mile north of military rd @ 8:05pm i saw 3 very bright orange lights in a perfectly horizontal line to the northwest.  lights were stationary.  the far right light slowly faded away, followed by the center light, then the left one.  the next day i spoke with at least 9 other people who witnessed similar lights ranging in numbers from 3 to 6 lights.
content.summary: Horizontal string of lights hovering then faded away

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on hickory downs at approximately 6:33 p m on sunday, november 13th, 2011.  as i approach the first stop sign of 3 on the way to my house on hickory downs i noticed in the north sky a very bright and intense white light about 3 times the size of a normal star  strobing almost blinding and moving ln erratic  manor zig zagging randomly in no apparent  pattern. it was traveling in about a mile wide swatch  from southeast to northwest. as it flashed it appeared to be traveling at the speed of light as it would reappear  randomly in another spot in the mile wide swatch suggesting that it was breaking the light barrier, i was only allowed to view the craft for 30 seconds as it was moving too fast for my pickup truck to keep up. it disappeared out of sight over the tree linees and i lost it. it made me feel quite hypnotized i felt the sensation of being in a trance all night long and still have some lingering affects of the experience. i have had feelings over the past 2 months that it would not be long until i saw another craft. i had felt it it would be on the date of 11/11/11 but it  ocurred  2 days later.
content.summary: Very bright intense white light flashing like a strobe light, it appeared to be breaking tphe speed of light, with every flash it would randomly zig zag and be in another area of about a mile wide swatch  traveling very fast from south east to northwest.

content.detailedDescription: Day trip to the mnts. 4 or 5 of us. we all felt like we werent up there for as long as the clock was saying. my brother had to get to work by 4pm. he was worried about being late all day, so i know we didnt just let it slip by. about two weeks later i was reviewing some pic on my camera and found the craziest picture. at first i wondered what it was i was photographing. the pic was just trees the side of a cliff and the sky, but when my eyes saw what i thought they saw my jaw dropped. to the right of the picture are two beings i understand you call greys. one is holding what appears to be some sort of testing device, and the other is directly behind the first. looking straight at me. creepy. i can remember the exact spot where i parked my jeep, i can remember my girlfriend asking why i was stopping, and i remember leaning on my jeep while i took this picture. i can not remember seeing it though. i havto have seen it. why else would i take a picture of the hill! another thing, knowone else remembers anything. i have been up there twice since. the last time was about two weeks ago. the dirt road is now blocked half way up. if you google (green mnt. road washington you will see half the mnt. when you get to the point on the road i took the picture,its blacked out. i will be going back up soon to see what else i can remember, and to see what i can find.
content.summary: I nor anyone i was with remember the event , wich in itself concerns me.

content.detailedDescription: Between 8 pm and 8:40 pm while outside a friends house in baden, pa. observed 5 low flying (tree level) white smokey rectangle shaped orbs.  the orbs were flying in a circular pattern while blinking on and off. every now and again they would leave their usual flight pattern and circle by themselves.  after 40 minutes, a helicopter shining a spotlight appeared over the ridge and the objects disappeared (blinked out). this event was witnessed by at least 5 people.
content.summary: White smokey rectangle shaped orbs at tree level

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back patio area smoking a cigarette, noticed two star light objects off of neighbors windows.  was moving one on top of other. absolutely no sound. it lasted only a few seconds.  soild star like appearance. leaving a gliter tail. lasted only a few seconds at most. moved too see directly too see objects as it was too my back . but objects was gone . it had complete silence. objects were traving too the s.W. direction. one object was moving in tandom with other only a meter apart from lower object and 1 and a half to 4 feet to rear of the lower object.  thought it looked like airplane lights on wingtips. but, was not flashing at all.  i am at a compelte loss to what it could be. let alone where it went.
content.summary: Star light, two objets,left trail, no souund, slow moving

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving into my driveway on my way home from tutoring a student.
2. i noticed the object as i had the top down on my jeep and saw something strange in my field of vision.
3. i thought it was an airplane at first but then realized airplanes have lights that indicate that they are airplanes and that they do not fly in triangular formations and disburse all of a sudden.
4. the object traveled south and kept a constant speed. it appeared as if it was hovering south yet it was ascending at the same time. the first objects that i saw (the triangular formation) disbursed into three separate directions and appeared to regroup (in video). after i finished recording the first objects i ran to my grandfather who was outside with me (who also saw the objects) and then noticed another series of objects traveling the same path that the triangular formation followed. the lights in the sky all exhibited the same behavior and the lights turned off after they finished ascending just below cloud level. the objects were still visible after the lights turned off and then vanished after a few seconds. 
5. i was excited and curious at the same time. my immediate action upon seeing the triangle was pulling out my cell phone to record the ufo event. overwhelmed with excitement, i only recorded the first sighting unfortunately .
6. multiple objects vanished as the lights turned off, however, they were visible for a short time after.

there was a second witness (my grandfather) however i doubt he wants to be included in this.
content.summary: Triangular formation of lights with disbursement with several more after the triangle broke apart

content.detailedDescription: Almost identical to case 33373 except i saw 5 or maybe six orbs move horizontally from south to north.  i was taking my dog out and saw this in the western sky.  my observation location is about 5 miles north of the observer in case 33373.  also, i notice that the lights were a little more orange in color.
content.summary: Horizontal string of lights in western sky

content.detailedDescription: It was around 6:15 pm when i went outside to check on my solar battery charger and i noticed a really bright light above my neighbors house.  it caught my attention because it was so bright.  it looked like jupiter but brighter.  it wasn't twinkling like a star but staying a constant brightness like a planet.  i thought it was odd but figured it was a planet and went back inside even though it was giving me an odd feeling.  about 20 minutes later i went outside again to smoke a cigarette and it was still there.  again i was surprised at how bright it was.  i went back inside and asked my girlfriend to look out the window at it but now it was flashing a reddish orange color instead of staying a bright white.  i got online to check and see if there were any planets or stars in the western sky that would explain it.  after about five minutes of searching and finding nothing i looked back out the window and it had moved.  it was really weird.  it was almost 7:00 pm now and the thing started to move, very slowly, to the southwest.  i freaked out.  i got in my truck and drove down the road to get a better look because the trees were blocking it.  by the time i parked down the road and got out of my truck it was gone.  i've never seen anything like this before.  picture the brightest star you've ever seen hovering in place for around thirty minutes then it suddenly changing colors and moving.  it was very strange and a little exciting to be honest.  i know what planes look like(i live about 10 miles from a small airport) and i know what helicopters look like as well.  this was not a plane or helicopter.  this was my first time experiencing something so strange.  i've been going in and out of the house all night now looking at the sky to see if i can see it again but i haven't seen anything but the usual planes flying over head.  again this looked like a super bright planet that started flashing colors and then flew away.  it was crazy!  i took two pictures but they came out horrible.  i'll attach them anyways.
content.summary: Super bright light in the sky, stayed in place for 20-30 minutes then changed colors and moved slowly to the southwest before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Saw first for them six them ten lights in formation flying give thousand feet in tenth of a second at times, other times hovering, splitting up, rejoining in a blink, flying loop the loops, blinking red and green some of them, mostly white though. from 9 ten to 945pm est. flying south from greenfield area of sky across town due north, observed from middle of frick park, flew.Straight over the widest part of the city north out of site. no joke, one hundred percent real. about to go reevaluaate what i want from life.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 then 6 2hen 10 lights splitting apart moving at least five thousand feet in a tenth of a second then stoping, then going back. all in a second.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my mom's down a back road when i noticed a mosquito in my car.  as i looked up to smack it i saw 2 amber colored lights.  driving a little further i saw a total of 3 above the tree line in a perfect triangular shape.  i stopped and got out to get a good look and saw it was hovering and not a sound was coming from it.  i could see it was metallic with 3 amber colored lights.  the outline on the bottom and right side was very clear, the top was vague with the top light slightly obscured.  it had an indentation in the middle from the bottom right corner up the right side.  i became a little unnerved, got back into my car and drove past 4 trees and it was gone completely.  i then heard and saw a couple of helicopters fly over head towards that direction.  i heard helicopters for the next 1/2 hour or so flying around. i drew a picture but cannot send on my iphone.
content.summary: 3 amber colored lights, one slightly obscured in a triangular form

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on i-80 in south chicago photographing a heavy chemtrail almost in the direct path of the sun. after reviewing the photos i noticed a cylinder shaped obeject in one of the photos. it appeared to me to be trying to hide in the sunlight. i also noticed a very strange notch in the chemtrail that it may have produced.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped ufo caught between sun and chemtrail.

content.detailedDescription:
I thought the light in this photo was from the exterior light fixture, but the light wasn't on !  didn't really notice it until viewing the photo after.

i'm sending a totally different event as well.  i took some photos after a renovation in grande prairie, ab, and noticed a strange ship looking thing with a trail later on.  the ship looking shot was taken july 19,2006.
content.summary: I took a picture of a house i renovated on a cloudy day and noticed a strange light in the photo after.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room at about 10pm and had to go to the bathroom, we have a window in our bathroom thats glass but you cant see through it (all you see is reflected light) and the entire window was just orange, which was weird because it was night time, i look out my bedroom window and see a circular ufo, about 50ft in diameter, about 10 blinking white lights around it and one red light in teh middle that would flash randomly and really fast. it was in a subdivision about 100 yards from my house, flying above the road and following a car that was driving out of the subdivison. i ran outside and the ufo took a sudden and sharp right turn and flew off in the distance, but instead of just gradually getting smaller and smaller until it wasn't noticable, the ufo just disappeared after about 20 seconds of flying in the distance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched circular ufo follow car then take sharp right and left

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a banquet that i had for school and i was just singing along to my music and noticed a really bright light about half a mile in front of me then it went away. so i slowed to a stop on the side of the road and watched a triangle shaped aircraft with very bright pulsating lights on the three ends of the aircraft fly near my car. the lights would stay on for about 2 seconds then go off and in the middle a very bright light would flash and go off almost immediately and this sequence continued. i turned off my radio and shut my car off to listen and watch. this aircraft was completely silent and seemed to blend in with the sky. the only way i noticed it was the star displacement in the sky and the bright lights emitted from the aircraft. the craft was flying very fast towards the direction of my car but slowed when it almost reached my car. it was maybe 20 feet above the treetops and it hovered for a few seconds about 200 feet to the northwest of my car above the tree line then resumed its flight. it made a slight alteration in course to go more towards the north but did not turn completely. i drove home and looked into the sky to see if it followed or i could still see it. i looked to the east and could see its middle light shining but from this point it was considerably smaller and looked like a helicopter search light. i was very flustered and confused so i came home and researched all the possible explanations before i came to the conclusion that it was a ufo. in the morning i looked around the area but there was no evidence that it had been there the night before.
content.summary: Ufo flies over car

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I saw what looked like 6 large glowing plasma engines flying over my car while driving west, just 15 miles east of kingman az, 11.3 miles as the crow flies, to the kingman airport. 
i saw a giant craft that had 6 large rectangle panels on the back end, that were glowing blue white, like plasma engines. it reminded me of  the ���millennium falcon" from the star wars movies. what first caught my eye was a sparking or flash on the bottom of the craft, as it moved over my car. then i saw two rows of 3 large rectangles, of blue white glowing lights. 
each rectangle appeared to be house size. they appeared to be at the rear of the craft as it moved away from me. it was amazing how big this looked to me, i said out loud to my self, "i hope its one of ours".  it looked like it was about 1000 feet up above me.

after looking through my gas and food receipts i was able to pin down the actual time of my sighting, at 8pm, just one mile east of 970 s blake ranch rd, kingman, az 86401-4546 on the i40. i was driving almost due west on i40 toward kingman az. i had just passed us93 when i saw the electrical sparks through my windshield to my right. it was flying along very slow for a jet and it had a ball of light traveling below it near the ground at the same rate of speed. you can see the ball in the first few frames of the video, but it might be a reflection. 

i fumbled for my video camera while driving, that took me about 20 to 30 seconds. at the beginning of the taping i passed a freeway sign, "blake ranch rd. exit 1 mile". i recorded until just after i pass the exit, the craft was to far away, maybe 4 or 5 miles. it would have passed over or near the kingman airport. someone should check with them. there were car lights behind me about a mile or two, i don't know if they saw anything.

when i played the tape later in needles at a gas stop, the cameras time code showed i had traveled one mile in 32 seconds!  no freaking way, i would have had to be going over 100mph. i was going tops 70-75 and my car was packed full of stuff, i was moving to ca. i tested the camera and nothing wrong there. i had a time shift or something?

i posted the video on youtube, but its just shaky lights due to being hand held. 
i have worked on the video and tried to stabilize the lights the best i can. it was far away by the time i got my camera out so you can't see the size the way i did.
i believe this craft was heading toward area 51, after researching the angle of the flight and the city lights relative to its direction. i plotted a straight line from my sighting to the base and its direction of travel. i think its one of ours!
 
i also contacted a company that is building plasma engines for nasa and asked them if they had anything that big up and flying around yet. i got no reply. i wrote them again and gave a description and let them know that they must have some competition out there.

 35���10'19.72"n 113���46'36.53"w elevation 4213ft google earth
content.summary: 6 large glowing plasma engines ?

content.detailedDescription:
On oct 8th i was driving home around 8pm central time. i was east bound on i-44 nearing the intersection of i-270 and noticed several bright lights (6-10)flying together. at first, i thought they were aircraft approaching lambert airport, but then i realized they were to close together. the objects were close together and were in formation. a straight line that tailed off, like a reverse "j" shape. 

i tried to watch and keep my eyes on the road, as best i could. when i turned northbound on i-270 the lights passed above my car and i lost visual contact at that time. the total time was about 1-2 minutes.
content.summary: I saw a string of bright lights, about 6-10 flying in a formation shaped like a

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of the sunset from the top of my roof on my house. when i put the pictures into my computer that's when i noticed an object in one of the photos - the photo was straight above my head/house and didn't even hear it at the time of taking the photo. the object above me was round with a inner round circle in the middle of it.  it looked grey/silver color. 

(information moved to fi box) cms 11/16/11 13:20 cst flg
i will be sending him 3 photos today.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sunset from the top of my roof and only seen this object when i put the picture on my computer.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on 11-15-11 around 11 pm in niagara falls ny. it was a clear night i was intending to use a new starfinding app on my phone when i noticed an unusual formation of lights in the sky. the lights were of a thin rectangular formation, six lights on the perimeter with a brighter light in the center. after watching the lights i realized it was moving across the sky. it first seemed to only be moving in a straight line across the sky, so i assumed it was a satellite then it changed directions and made a 90 degree turn in the sky. shortly after the turn it was then obscured by clouds.
content.summary: Lights in thin rectangualar ridged formation, moved in straight line across the sky, then changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
In june of '97 my fiance, my college-aged daughter and i were en route to a family reunion in tehachipi, ca driving from little rock, ar on i-40.  

i was sitting in the passenger side front seat when, in the vicinity of flagstaff az, i noticed two "brighter than normal" stars on the horizon north of the road.  the clock on the car said 10:30 p.M. which would have been central daylight time, 9:30 p.M. az time. they were just so incredibly bright i asked my fiance to notice them.  after watching them for a few minuts while driving down the freeway i finally asked him to pull over.  i got out the binocs and we both looked at these things, not being able to tell much about any structure but amazed at how brilliantly bright-white they were, glowing, larger than a star...Sitting there just above the horizon in the twilight with the mountains faint outline below. 

as we were just looking at these things from the side of the road trying to figure out what it was we were looking at, the object on the left (west side) suddenly zoomed across the sky at an impossible speed, stopped and sat in the sky just as it had done when we initially spotted it.  it went from dead still to at least 45 miles away in one second or less.  three witnesses.  

seconds after, the object that had been on the right (east) started traveling to the east, the opposite direction from the other, at a casual pace.  

the left object had absolutely no blinking lights on it.  i think the object on the right might have had what appeared to be a blinking red light.  

since we could not believe what we had just witnessed we took off down the interstate in pursuit of this thing.  there was no traffic on this stretch of highway, seemingly in the middle of no where.  so, my fiance floored it!

we had no conversation.  we were all stunned.  we topped out at speeds of which i will not admit, trying to catch this object that was right before us. 

while flying westward down the freeway yet another event.  another bright thing "blinked on" in the sky out of no where and started moving slowly in the direction of the one we were trying to catch.  after a few minutes of watching both of them, the "blinker" disappeared.  no cloud cover.  it was a very clear night. 

we drove down the freeway for a good 45 minutes, "very quickly", trying to get on this thing and never got close. i never took my eyes off of it, save the time the "blinker" showed up and even then i had one eye on each of the two objects.  we finally lost sight of the object behind some buildings in a small town we had come to, and perhaps some mountains.  

we are all into the sciences and know that even physics 101 says no carbon based life form could have withstood that speed without collapsing or imploding.  if someone was driving that thing it wasn't one of us.
content.summary: White light object streaks across the sky and stops again.

content.detailedDescription:
In response to another case reported from neenah/winnebago area-case# 33373- ufo's were visible from ripon wisconsin as well.  also appeared to be in the western direction and not too far in the distance.  i've been starbathing for about 6 years now with much video proof of many activities in my area, as well as objects on the ground, and in my tree-60 feet off front porch which i may send that video for you too, another time.  these particular objects i have gotten on video basically doing the same thing in 2009-for 3 days, with our lovely military doing there best to chase them with 7 or 8 fighter jets.  this time no jets, but the scenario is the same-lights open up in the sky, craft comes out, and lights fade out. the last time i caught it on video it was lighter and you can make out shiny spheres in the video that would light up a little bit when they accelerated or changed direction abruptly.  too dark to make that out this time but what came out definetly strobed kind of like a plane but different kind of light.  i missed four of them for sure when i turned and ran to get the camera, possibly more when i was out of sight, but for sure the first four i saw i didnt get, but could still see blinkys when i got back.  

1.Where was i?  at home
2.How did i notice?  giant lights in the sky-kinda hard to miss
3.What did i think?  uhhh-cameras thatta way---->
4.Description? some kind of transportation
5.My feelings? i see so much that i dont get emotional
6.How lose sight? bright holes went away and blinkys scattered

i rendered this video as mpg but original is high definition
content.summary: Response to case# 33373   video for you

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my daughter, looking at the stars as we do most nights. we have noted jupiter before and have never seen what we saw tonight. there was an object near jupiter that was just as bright, but shaped almost like the arrow-style cursor on most computers. it sparkled and seemed to undulate back and forth. at times there would be a red light, then it would almost elongate to a straight line. there was occasional cloud cover, but the object still shined brightly through the clouds, almost like it was in the clouds. other stars did not shine as brightly.
content.summary: Chevron-shaped light near jupiter

content.detailedDescription: Bright white objects were observed immediately as they appeared to driver and passenger while driving west on us highway 10 near the junction of winnebago county m east of neenah, wi at 9:33 pm cst, tuesday, november 15. the sky was mainly clear with stars visible. one white circular object about the size of a dime from the observers' standpoint appeared about 15 degrees off the western horizon (straight ahead of the car). its brightness was roughly comparable to the intensity of a full moon. within a few seconds, at least three and possibly four other identical white orbs appeared one-by-one in a horizontal line (perhaps 10 degrees in length) which stretched from south to north. they disappeared within a minute, not to be seen again. observers saw little or no motion in any of the orbs. an estimation of the distance of these lights to the observers is not possible. this writer does not believe them to have behaved like aircraft, flares, or any 'usual' nighttime phenomena. personal reactions were limited to the knowledge of having seen something unusual and made us wonder if others saw the same thing. a long discussion of the pros and cons of ufos are ensued....
content.summary: One white circular object appeared in the west, followed by 3 or 4 more of the same. they fa north-south line which blinked out after about 30 seconds to one minute.      t

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at 10:45 am with a sunny cloudless sky and saw a rectangular white, shining object moving slowly from west to east almost directly overhead.  i watched as it noiselessly moved across the sky on a direct line to the east.   there were several jets flying at high altitudes in the sky with contrails, this had no contrail and the sunlight reflected off of it like glass. i estimate that it was flying at around 10,000 ft. or so and as it was gliding above me, i realized that it was not an aircraft that i had ever seen before. read that someone saw a similar craft over ballwin, mo today. didn't have a camera or phone with me. always considered the possiblity, but now know it is a reality.
content.summary: I saw a white shining craft moving east over wichita, ks at 10:45 am central time.

content.detailedDescription: Before work, i was sitting in my back yard drinking coffee. i usually do this every morning i work. i was looking toward orion's belt when i noticed a distinct red light flash. i continued to watch and observed the same light flash every 8 to 10 seconds. after each flash there was a very faint red flash immediately afterward in the same spot. it could have been 2 lights or it could have been 1 flashing twice. there was no noise, no other lights and no shape could be seen. i saw nothing except the lights.No outlines of any kind. the light was going in a straight, airplane type direction. i observed this for about 20 minutes. it traveled about as far as the length of the big dipper's handle. as the flashing light neared orion's belt, the flash began to fade. as the space station would if you were watching it. i see military aircraft all the time since i grew up around miramar nas. i have observed commercial aircraft also. the way the light faded away gradually gave me the impression that it was very high and soundless. i could hear all the normal night time wildlife in the area. though i could not tell what it was, my only guess would be that it was a military aircraft flying very high and very slowly. the red flashing light appeared to have the same intensity or brightness of the military helicopters i see at night with only the red lights flashing. i have never seen this before or since. i did not feel any different while i was observing this flashing light. no loss of sleep or any other out of the ordinary change to me or my surroundings. it was completely quiet, the object that is. no noise, lights, outlines or smell of any kind. i did notice that the stars did not effect the flashing. meaning that the object was between me and the stars.
content.summary: Only saw a flashing red sequential fight for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was stopped behind a bus while heading east on stony plain road, close to 149 st intersection in edmonton.  the bus was loading/unloading several passengers, so i had time to look around.  looked to my left out the driver's side window and saw an unusual formation of lights in the sky.  the formation was flying very slowly towards me - i soon could see 5 distinct lights in a v-formation.  the lights were very large, round-shaped, and warm white in color.  the lights were large and contiguous with each other.  no halo or bleeding of one light to the next - very distinct round shaped. the object was flying very low and not changing altitude.  it was traveling south (so it was flying perpendicular to, and towards me).  i turned off my ipod and opened my window and stuck my head out to determine if there was any sound (and hopefully to signal to other people to look up).  i could hear no sound over that of traffic.   as the object got closer - i estimate within 500 feet (< 150 m) total distance from me (horizontal and vertical) - i could observe that the lights were attached to a single silver-gray translucent craft with a body down the center. the craft itself may have been triangular rather than a v.  the object was almost overhead when i noticed the bus was gone.  no one had honked, so hopefully the drivers behind me were as transfixed by the object as i was.
 
i slowly started driving - looking for a place to pull-off so i could get out and take a better look.  my husband called on the cell phone at that moment - i thought he had seen it too.   i did not answer the phone (due to distracted driving) but the time of the missed call was 7:13:13, therefore i can be very precise about the time of sighting.  by the time i pulled onto a side street to return his call, i could no longer see the object due to distance and trees obstructing my view.
 
i watched the craft for 45-sec to 1-min.  sunset was at 6:33 pm on oct. 17, 2011 in edmonton.  the skies were clear and calm.
 
the ipod i had with me was 1st-generation shuffle, and my cell-phone is dumb.  neither have cameras.  i was therefore unable to take a picture/video.
 
if others saw this object i hope that they report their sighting.  i also hope that someone got photos or video - there would have been plenty of time to do so if one had the technology with them.

(in the report above i said the object appeared aspirin sized.  each light was aspirin sized, so the object was 3x aspirin sized in length down each side.)

note:  i wrote this report the evening of the sighting.  i submitted it to a local ufo group, but did not hear back from them.  although i have no evidence, i wanted to have this sighting documented.
content.summary: V- or triangle-shaped ufo slowly moving over west edmonton
